creditline: Gift of Lucille and Arthur Weiss
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Group of 8 rings, all different.  .1 is shell, the others earthenware. Seven clay rings, imitating shell variety.  Four rings are 1-1/2 in. in diam.  Other rings measure 1-3/4 in., 1-15/16 in., and 2 in. in diameter.
title: Clay Ring
